message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it will be highly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,000. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product is worth a significant investment. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?

I appreciate your flexibility, but $11,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I also need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
